question.text: Boss, if the money I previously topped up into my wallet hasn’t been used for betting, can I withdraw it?
variations: Bos, kalau duit yang saya topup ke dompet sebelum ni tak guna untuk pertaruhan, boleh tarik ke?
Boss, if the money I previously topped up into my wallet hasn’t been used for betting, can I withdraw it?
老闆，如果之前充值到錢包裡的錢還沒有用來投注，能不能提現？

languages.en: Can I withdraw deposited funds if I haven’t placed any bets?
languages.ms: Bolehkah saya mengeluarkan dana deposit jika saya belum membuat pertaruhan?
languages.cn: 未投注的充值金额能否提现？

detailed.en: "Sorry, boss, the top-up amount cannot be withdrawn. You need to place bets and win 30% before you can make a withdrawal! 😊"
detailed.ms: "Maaf, bos, jumlah topup tidak boleh ditarik keluar. Anda perlu membuat pertaruhan dan menang 30% sebelum boleh mengeluarkan! 😊"
detailed.cn: "抱歉，老闆，充值金額無法提現。您需要投注並贏得30%後才能提款哦！😊"

question.text: How long does it take for a withdrawal to be processed?

languages.en: How long does it take for a withdrawal to be processed?
languages.ms: Berapa lamakah masa yang diperlukan untuk memproses pengeluaran?

detailed.en: "Boss, withdrawal processing normally takes 5-30 minutes to complete. If it’s not credited after 30 minutes, please inform us immediately! 😊"
detailed.ms: "Bos, pemprosesan pengeluaran biasanya mengambil masa 5-30 minit untuk selesai. Jika belum masuk selepas 30 minit, sila maklumkan kepada kami segera! 😊"
detailed.cn: "老闆，提款處理通常需要5-30分鐘完成。如果超過30分鐘還未到帳，請立即通知我們哦！😊"

detailed.en:
"Hi boss, the minimum withdrawal is RM10 ya. 😊💰

📌 Withdrawal Conditions:
✅ Minimum amount RM10
✅ You need to win at least 30% of your capital before you can withdraw

If you have other questions, reply to us in live chat ya boss! 🙏🔥"
detailed.ms:
"Hi boss, minimum withdraw adalah RM10 ya. 😊💰

📌 Syarat Withdraw:
✅ Jumlah minimum RM10
✅ Perlu menang sekurang-kurangnya 30% daripada modal sebelum boleh withdraw

Kalau ada pertanyaan lain, boleh roger kami di live chat ya boss! 🙏🔥"
detailed.cn:
"嗨，老闆，最低提款是RM10哦。😊💰

📌 提款條件：
✅ 最低金額RM10
✅ 需贏至少30%的本金才能提款

若有其他問題，請在即時訊息回覆我們哦，老闆！🙏🔥"

question.text: Berapa jumlah minimum untuk withdrawal dan apakah panduan kategori pertaruhan 4D, 3D, dan 2D?
variations: Berapa minimum jumlah yang diperlukan untuk withdraw dan bagaimana kategori 4D, 3D, 2D ditentukan?
Apa syarat minimum untuk withdrawal dan panduan untuk pertaruhan 4D, 3D, 2D?
Berapakah jumlah minimum withdraw dan bagaimana cara menentukan 3D dan 2D daripada 4D?

languages.en: "What is the minimum amount required for withdrawal and what are the betting guidelines for 4D, 3D, and 2D?"
languages.ms: "Berapa jumlah minimum untuk withdrawal dan apakah panduan kategori pertaruhan 4D, 3D, dan 2D?"
languages.cn: "取款的最低金额是多少，以及4D、3D和2D的投注指南是什么？"

detailed.en:
"Hi boss, the current minimum withdrawal amount is RM30. Additionally, here are the guidelines for the betting categories:

• 4D (Tegak Sahaja): Includes prizes 4A (1st), 4B (2nd), 4C (3rd), 4D (Special), and 4E (Consolation).

• 3D: Based on the last three digits of the 4D number, with categories such as 3A (1st), 3B (2nd), 3C (3rd), 3D (Special, multiplied by 10), 3E (Consolation, multiplied by 10), and 3N covering all prizes.

• 2D: Based on the last two digits of the 4D number, with categories 2A (1st), 2B (2nd), 2C (3rd), 2D (Special, multiplied by 10), 2E (Consolation, multiplied by 10), and 2N covering all prizes.

For 3D and 2D, only the ending digits of the 4D number are used (e.g., if 4D = 1234, then 3D = 234 and 2D = 34)."
detailed.ms:
"Hi boss, jumlah minimum untuk withdrawal adalah RM30. Berikut juga panduan untuk kategori pertaruhan:

• 4D (Tegak Sahaja): Termasuk hadiah 4A (1st), 4B (2nd), 4C (3rd), 4D (Special) dan 4E (Consolation).

• 3D: Berdasarkan tiga digit terakhir nombor 4D, dengan kategori seperti 3A (1st), 3B (2nd), 3C (3rd), 3D (Special, X10), 3E (Consolation, X10) dan 3N merangkumi semua hadiah.

• 2D: Berdasarkan dua digit terakhir nombor 4D, dengan kategori 2A (1st), 2B (2nd), 2C (3rd), 2D (Special, X10), 2E (Consolation, X10) dan 2N merangkumi semua hadiah.

Untuk 3D dan 2D, hanya digit terakhir nombor 4D yang digunakan (contoh: jika 4D = 1234, maka 3D = 234 dan 2D = 34)."
detailed.cn:
"嗨，老板，当前的最低取款金额是RM30。以下是4D、3D和2D投注的指南：

• 4D（竖式）：包括4A（一等奖）、4B（二等奖）、4C（三等奖）、4D（特别奖）和4E（安慰奖）。

• 3D：基于4D号码的后三位，分类包括3A（一等）、3B（二等）、3C（三等）、3D（特别奖，X10）、3E（安慰奖，X10）以及涵盖所有奖项的3N。

• 2D：基于4D号码的后两位，分类包括2A（一等）、2B（二等）、2C（三等）、2D（特别奖，X10）、2E（安慰奖，X10）以及涵盖所有奖项的2N。

对于3D和2D，只取4D号码的末尾数字（例如：如果4D = 1234，则3D = 234，2D = 34）。"

question.text: Boss, my withdrawal just now was rejected
variations: Boss, my withdrawal just now was rejected
老闆，我剛才提款被拒絕了

languages.en: Why was my withdrawal just now rejected?
languages.cn: 為什麼我剛才的提款被拒絕了？

detailed.en:
"Hi boss, if the withdrawal was rejected, the credit should automatically return to your wallet.

📌 Check your wallet first, if it’s not there:
🔹 Log out & log back into the app.
🔹 If it’s still not visible, try restarting your phone or switching networks (WiFi/Data).

📌 If it still hasn’t returned after checking, reply to us in live chat for further help! 😊🙏"
detailed.ms:
"Hi boss, kalau withdraw ditolak (rejected), kredit pasti akan dikembalikan ke wallet secara automatik.

📌 Boss boleh semak wallet dulu, jika belum masuk:
🔹 Logout & login semula ke dalam app.
🔹 Jika masih tak nampak, cuba restart phone atau tukar rangkaian internet (WiFi/Data).

📌 Jika masih belum masuk selepas semakan, boleh roger kami di live chat untuk bantuan lanjut! 😊🙏"
detailed.cn:
"嗨，老闆，如果提款被拒絕（rejected），信用應該會自動回到您的錢包。

📌 先檢查您的錢包，如果還沒進帳：
🔹 登出並重新登入應用程式。
🔹 如果還是看不到，試著重啟手機或切換網路（WiFi/數據）。

📌 如果檢查後還是沒進帳，請在即時訊息回覆我們獲取進一步幫助！😊🙏"

question.text: Why do I need to meet turnover requirements before withdrawing?
variations: Why must I reach turnover to withdraw?
What's the purpose of turnover requirements?

languages.en: Why do I need to meet turnover requirements before withdrawing?
languages.ms: Kenapa saya perlu capai turnover sebelum withdraw?
languages.cn: 為什麼我必須達到流水要求才能提款？

detailed.en: Turnover requirements are standard conditions, boss! You need to achieve a minimum betting amount (usually 30% of your deposit) before you can withdraw your money. This helps prevent misuse and maintains fair play for everyone.
detailed.ms: Syarat turnover tu standard je, boss! Anda perlu capai jumlah pertaruhan minimum (biasanya 30% daripada deposit anda) sebelum boleh withdraw duit. Ini untuk elakkan salah guna dan pastikan permainan adil untuk semua.
detailed.cn: 流水要求是標準的規定，老板！您必須達到最低投注額（通常是存款的30％），才能提取您的資金。這是為了防止濫用，並保持遊戲公平。
